name: Aerosol Cans
details: Must be empty. No full or partially-full cans. Remove plastic caps. Labels are okay. Spray nozzles are okay.

name: Glassware
keywords: glass glassware drinking cups glasses vases

name: Glass Bottles & Jars
details: Food & beverage glass bottles & jars only. Remove lids. Large metal lids can be recycled, but still must be removed.

name: Foil Bags
keywords: aluminum foil bags potata chip snack bags
details: Such as potato chip bags

name: Foil Lids
details: Such as yogurt lids

name: Aluminum Cans
keywords: aluminum cans beer cans soda cans pop cans
details: Do not crush aluminum cans

name: Aluminum Trays
details: Remove as much food residue as possible

name: Aluminum Foil
details: Remove as much food residue as possible

name: Cardboard
details: Flatten and cut to pieces no larger than 2 feet by 2 feet.

name: Paperboard
keywords: paperboard boxes shoe boxes gift boxes cereal boxes tissue boxes egg cartons toilet paper tubes paper towel tubes
details: Flatten and cut to pieces no larger than 2 feet by 2 feet. Remove plastic bags, plastic film or wax paper bags. Includes boxes for cereal, tissues, food; gift boxes and shoe boxes; hanging file folders; toilet paper and paper towel tubes

name: Pizza Boxes
details: Accepted, only if not greased through to the other side.

name: Bubble Wrap
details: Includes envelopes with bubble wrap inside

name: Candy or Food Wrappers
details: Includes envelopes with bubble wrap inside

name: Cassettes, DVD's, CD's, or plastic cases
keywords: Cassettes DVDs CDs DVD's CD's plastic cases

name: Plastic Tubes
details: Such as garden hoses

name: Juice Pouches
details: Paperboard juice boxes okay.

name: K-Cups
keywords: K-Cups K Cups individual coffee creamers

name: Rigid Plastic Bottles
keywords: Rigid Plastic Bottles soda bottles water bottles shampoo bottles soap bottles
details: Exmaples like soda, water, shampoo, soap bottles.

name: Rigid Plastic Jugs
keywords: Rigid Plastic Jugs milk jugs laundry detergent jugs cat litter jugs.
details: Exmaples like milk, laundry detergent, cat litter jugs.

name: Rigid Plastic Jars
keywords: Rigid Plastic Tubs peanut butter jars mayonnaise jars
details: Examples like peanut butter and mayonnaise jars.

name: Rigid Plastic Tubs
keywords: Rigid Plastic Tubs yogurt sour cream cottage cheese butter tubs
details: Examples like yogurt, sour cream, cottage cheese, and butter tubs.

name: Rigid Plastic Trays
details: Like those used for microwave dinners

name: Clear Plastic 'Clam-Shell' Containers
keywords: plastic containers clam-shell containers strawberry berries cookies egg cartons
details: Like those used strawberries, bakery goods, and salads and including egg cartons and cookie divider shells.

name: Plastic Containers
details: Plastic labeled #1-#7.

name: Paper Food & Beverage Cartons
keywords: paper cartons food cartons beverage cartons milk cartons juice cartons egg cartons juice boxes ice cream cartons
details: Do not flatten cartons. All food and beverage cartons including: Milk (dairy, soy & almond), juice, cream, egg white & egg substitute, soup & broth, protein drinks, eggnog, wine, tofu, small juice boxes and ice cream & frozen yogurt.

name: Hot/Cold Paper Cups
keywords: hot cups cold cups paper coffee cups
details: Paper cups must be clean and empty. Paper cups must be bare â€” all sleeves, lids, straws and stirring sticks must be removed.

name: Newspapers, Magazines, and Catalogs
details: Includes phone books. Remove plastic bags and wrap. Discard non-paper inserts such as magnets or sample packets.

name: Office Paper, Junk Mail, and Stationary
keywords: office paper junk mail staples envelopes postcards greeting cards inde cards stationary
details: Window envelopes are okay to recycle. Paperclips, stamps, staples, tape and sticky notes are okay.

name: Paper Bags
details: Department store 'non-glossy' type paper bags are okay, but remove rope handles.

name: Wrapping or Tissue Paper
keywords: wrapping paper tissue paper gift wrap ribbons
details: Includes ribbons and bows.

name: Paper plates, paper towels, tissues, napkins
keywords: paper plates paper towels tissues napkins
